title: You are ineligible to earn loot due to previous behavioral restrictions.
body: i just got out of a 10 game chat ristriction how long until i can get loot.... for my champ mastery

replies.body:
After being punished by one of our player behavior systems, players will enter a _"reform period"_ before they can use the Hextech Crafting system again.

>  _"Your reform period isn't over after a speicifc number of games, or after a certain date, but is completely dependent upon your behavior."_ - [Source](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463)

Essentially, just keep playing games with positive behavior and you'll be back on Hextech Crafting in no time.

WoW you are good.
Thanks for your help Telecasterdude!

how do i find out when the reform period goes for ?
{{champion:32}}

The reform period is different for each person, depending on the severity of the punishment and how smoothly they reform. It's not dependent on a specific number of games or time-frame either, but rather a consistent display of positive behavior.

**Riot** doesn't release exact the requirements necessary for each individual player's reform period, but we can make an educated guess that yours shouldn't take very long it all. This is your first offense so the system will be forgiving.

Check this out [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463) for more information, or feel free to ask if you're still confused ;)
